p:
The first use of an EBOV kinetic model in vivo was to characterize the curative efficacy of favipiravir in a mice model.
33 Twenty IFNαR−/− mice infected with Makona strain EBOV received favipiravir 300 mg/day initiated at D6 ( N = 5) or D8 ( N = 5), or were left untreated ( N = 10), leading to survival rates at D25 of 100%, 0%, and 0%, respectively.
